ItemTooltips.gem: GO AWAY NYX NOBODY LIKES YOU
ItemTooltips.ghost:
Might save you after you waste your entire mana pool to zap a CM.
Also, Ethereal Blade!
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: When you're full slotted/against a tinker/furion.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Put them on Int cause you're storm and you can never die.
ItemTooltips.null_talisman: Gives you good damage and you need it for your dagon.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Full range ulti > Veil (Highest range) > Orchid > Ethereal > Dagon 5
ItemTooltips.dagon: Get it to level 5 asap and start zapping!
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: If you're in a tryhard mood.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: Full range ulti > Veil (Highest range) > Ethereal > Dagon 5

AbilityTooltips.storm_spirit_static_remnant: 1 Level is enough to get lasthits in the lane and push it for rune control.
AbilityTooltips.storm_spirit_electric_vortex: Disable, mostly better to (almost) max it first. 3 levels are enough for the pulled hero to get to your remnant
AbilityTooltips.storm_spirit_overload: Really helpful in the laning phase, if harassing with it you will most likely get more 1-2 hits while he is trying to get back, and if not - will give you a free lasthit. Best dps after you get your ulti (hit > ulti > hit > ulti, they wont know what got em).
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: All of your skills are SO good, no reason to get stats before maxing them.
